 Sale Hotel San Maria, nestled on the slopes of the Lesser Caucasus at a height of about 1750 meters above sea level, only two hours away from Tbilisi in the alpine ski resort of Bakuriani .
Distance from Batumi to Bakuriani 300 km from Tbilisi to Bakuriani Airport 200 km.
The village is also connected with Borjomi automotive and light railway .
Located in the center of town, close to the ski slopes ' Didveli ' and ' Tatra- Poma .' Also, at 9 km . from hot springs Tsihisdzhavri , 28 km from the monastery complex in the XI century and Timoteubani Tabatskuri alpine lake .
The hotel is 4 floors of 800 square meters . m is located on land 1900 square meters. m The hotel has 10 rooms, including 2 duplex , 5 -bedroom and 3 -bedroom .
Rooms at the San Maria colorful décor and natural wood. The very same hotel decorated with natural stone .
Each room has a shower , toilet, television, furniture, internet . The hotel also has a lounge with a fireplace. Front of the hotel a large area for 10 cars . Behind the hotel to a mountain stream .
The hotel operates since 2007. The hotel has central heating (natural gas , diesel ) , water pipes with new , sewer , internet, TV . Not far away there is a shop , restaurant, bar .
Basement unrepaired . There you can make restaurant, conference room, sauna . On the land there is a place for open-air cafe and a playground , as well you can build additional housing.
From the fully equipped and comfortable rooms offer spectacular views of the hillsides and forests.
The number of tourists is increasing every year attracting new clientele . Gain on good management will grow.
Bakuriani perfect place for both winter and summer recreation for the whole family .
